life

Class Ecosystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.Ecosystem

  • public class Ecosystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Varun on 2017-01-10. Contains simulation logic Class for an ecosystem. Contains a 2D array of life.organisms

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ecosystem

        public Ecosystem()

      • Ecosystem

        public Ecosystem(Organism[][] ecosystem)
        Creates an ecosystem from an existing 2D array of life.organisms. Mainly used when loading from a file.
        Parameters:
        ecosystem - 2D array of life.organisms in an existing configuration.

        row - Row to add to
